com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Interface LoadHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLoadHandler 

    public interface LoadHandler
    Allows handling any load activity including filtering all URLs loaded in Browser component. Using LoadHandler you can cancel any load event or suppress problematic SSL certificates.
    允许处理任何加载活动，包括过滤浏览器组件中加载的所有URL。使用LoadHandler可以取消任何加载事件或取消有问题的SSL证书。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onCertificateError(CertificateErrorParams params)
      Informs that SSL certificate error has occurred.
      通知发生SSL证书错误。
      boolean onLoad(LoadParams params)
      Invoked before native engine starts loading the URL defined in the LoadParams.getURL() method.
      在本机引擎开始加载LoadParams.getURL（）方法中定义的URL之前调用。

    • Method Detail

      • onLoad

        boolean onLoad(LoadParams params)
        Invoked before native engine starts loading the URL defined in the LoadParams.getURL() method.

        If this method throws exception, the loading will continue.
        在本机引擎开始加载LoadParams.getURL（）方法中定义的URL之前调用。如果此方法引发异常，则加载将继续。
        Parameters:
        params - information about load event. -有关加载事件的信息。
        Returns:
        true if loading must be canceled. 是否必须取消加载。

      • onCertificateError

        boolean onCertificateError(CertificateErrorParams params)
        Informs that SSL certificate error has occurred. The passed params object contains information about problematic SSL certificate. You can accept this SSL certificate and continue loading resource. The SSL certificate will not be added to the list of trusted certificates.

        If this method throws exception, the SSL certificate error will be ignored and the required resource will be loaded.
        通知发生SSL证书错误。传递的params对象包含有关有问题的SSL证书的信息。您可以接受此SSL证书并继续加载资源。 SSL证书不会添加到可信证书列表中。如果此方法引发异常，则将忽略SSL证书错误，并将加载所需的资源。
        Parameters:
        params - provides information about problematic SSL certificate. -提供有关有问题的SSL证书的信息。
        Returns:
        true if loading must be canceled and false if you ignore SSL certificate error and want to load the required resource. 是否必须取消加载以及是否忽略SSL证书错误并想加载所需的资源。
